name: Mischief at Heaven: A Race to Judgement Day!
name_original: Mischief at Heaven: A Race to Judgement Day!
description: In order to maintain peace, you have to retain order. In this new, simple and challenging game, you have to solve the puzzle and find the correct order for the eggs based on the clues provided to you. Pace yourself and think fast for all your actions will be judged.
